description: A dashboard to display data exported by NUT UPS

panels.description: ##### Input Voltage (V) | Nominal | Min | Max | |---------|-------|-------| | 230 V | 190 V | 270 V | | Zone | Threshold (V) | Color | |-----------------|---------------|--------------------------------------| | Critical Low | <200 | ● dark-red | | Warning Low | 200 – 207 | ● dark-yellow | | Normal | 207 – 253 | ● dark-green | | Warning High | 253 – 260 | ● dark-yellow | | Critical High | >260 | ● dark-red |
panels.title: Input Voltage

panels.description: ##### Input Frequency (Hz) | Nominal | Min | Max | |---------|------|------| | 50 Hz | 40 Hz| 60 Hz| | Zone | Threshold (Hz) | Color | |-----------------|----------------|--------------------------------------| | Critical Low | <47 | ● dark-red | | Warning Low | 47 – 49 | ● dark-yellow | | Normal | 49 – 51 | ● dark-green | | Warning High | 51 – 53 | ● dark-yellow | | Critical High | >53 | ● dark-red |
panels.title: Input Frequency

panels.description: ##### Output Voltage (V) | Nominal | Min | Max | |---------|-------|-------| | 230 V | 190 V | 270 V | | Zone | Threshold (V) | Color | |-----------------------|---------------|--------------------------------------| | Critical Low | <200 | ● dark-red | | Warning Low | 200 – 207 | ● dark-yellow | | Normal (General) | 207 – 253 | ● dark-green | | Normal (Online ±2%) | 225 – 235 | ● green | | Warning High | 253 – 260 | ● dark-yellow | | Critical High | >260 | ● dark-red |
panels.title: Output Voltage

panels.description: ##### Output Frequency (Hz) | Nominal | Min | Max | |---------|------|------| | 50 Hz | 40 Hz| 60 Hz| | Zone | Threshold (Hz) | Color | |------------------------|----------------|--------------------------------------| | Critical Low | <47 | ● dark-red | | Warning Low | 47 – 49 | ● dark-yellow | | Normal (General) | 49 – 51 | ● dark-green | | Normal (Online ±0.1 Hz)| 49.9 – 50.1 | ● green | | Warning High | 51 – 53 | ● dark-yellow | | Critical High | >53 | ● dark-red |
panels.title: Output Frequency

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "real_power" or r["_field"] == "nominal_power")
  |> drop(columns: ["serial","host","model","driver_version","driver_version_data"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ups_power" or r["_field"] == "ups_power_nominal")
  |> drop(columns: ["serial","host","model","driver_version","driver_version_data"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load_percent")  
  |> drop(columns: ["serial","host","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "internal_temp")
  |> drop(columns: ["serial","host","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "output_current" or r["_field"] == "output_voltage" or r["_field"] == "ups_power_nominal")
  |> drop(columns: ["serial","host","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "real_power" or r["_field"] == "ups_power")
  |> drop(columns: ["serial","host","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "battery_voltage")
  |> drop(columns: ["serial","host","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

panels.description:
Bypass Off - Take the UPS out of Bypass mode [Inverter (On/Off)].

Bypass On - Put the UPS in Bypass mode [Auto Bypass (On/Off)].
panels.title: Input Bypass Switch

panels.description:
Input ECO Switch - Input High Efficiency (aka ECO) mode switch.

Input Bypass Forced - Rule for allow auto Bypass switch (on/off) transfer modes (enabled or disabled).
panels.title: Input Transfer Switch

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load_percent" or r["_field"] == "nominal_power")  
  |> drop(columns: ["host","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if r._field == "nominal_power" then r._value / 100 else r._value }))
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "output_current" or r["_field"] == "output_voltage")
  |> drop(columns: ["host","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ups_power" or r["_field"] == "real_power")
  |> drop(columns: ["host","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ups_status")
  |> drop(columns: ["serial","host","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "battery_charge_percent" or r["_field"] == "battery_voltage")
  |> drop(columns: ["serial","host","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

panels.description: ##### Input/Output Voltage (V) | Nominal | Min | Max | |---------|-------|-------| | 230 V | 190 V | 270 V | | Zone | Threshold (V) | Color | |-----------------|---------------|--------------------------------------| | Critical Low | <200 | ● dark-red | | Warning Low | 200 – 207 | ● dark-yellow | | Normal | 207 – 253 | ● teal | | Warning High | 253 – 260 | ● dark-yellow | | Critical High | >260 | ● dark-red | | Zone | Threshold (V) | Color | |-----------------------|---------------|--------------------------------------| | Critical Low | <200 | ● dark-red | | Warning Low | 200 – 207 | ● dark-yellow | | Normal (General) | 207 – 253 | ● dark-blue | | Normal (Online ±2%) | 225 – 235 | ● blue | | Warning High | 253 – 260 | ● dark-yellow | | Critical High | >260 | ● dark-red |

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "input_voltage" or r["_field"] == "output_voltage")
  |> drop(columns: ["host","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

panels.title: UPS Voltage

panels.description: ##### Input/Output Frequency (Hz) | Nominal | Min | Max | |---------|------|------| | 50 Hz | 40 Hz| 60 Hz| | Zone | Threshold (Hz) | Color | |-----------------|----------------|--------------------------------------| | Critical Low | <47 | ● dark-red | | Warning Low | 47 – 49 | ● dark-yellow | | Normal | 49 – 51 | ● teal | | Warning High | 51 – 53 | ● dark-yellow | | Critical High | >53 | ● dark-red | | Zone | Threshold (Hz) | Color | |------------------------|----------------|--------------------------------------| | Critical Low | <47 | ● dark-red | | Warning Low | 47 – 49 | ● dark-yellow | | Normal (General) | 49 – 51 | ● dark-blue | | Normal (Online ±0.1 Hz)| 49.9 – 50.1 | ● blue | | Warning High | 51 – 53 | ● dark-yellow | | Critical High | >53 | ● dark-red |

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "input_frequency" or r["_field"] == "output_frequency")
  |> drop(columns: ["host","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

panels.title: UPS Frequency

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  //|> range(start: -1d)  // Last day
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "real_power")
  |> drop(columns: ["host","serial","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> group(columns: ["real_power", "_measurement"], mode:"by")  
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, timeSrc:"_start")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 1000.0}))  //needed if unit in kwh
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  //|> range(start: -1d)  // Last day
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "real_power")
  |> drop(columns: ["host","serial","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> group(columns: ["real_power", "_measurement"], mode:"by")  
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, timeSrc:"_start")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 1000.0}))  //needed if unit in kwh
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  //|> range(start: -1d)  // Last day
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "real_power")
  |> drop(columns: ["host","serial","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> group(columns: ["real_power", "_measurement"], mode:"by")  
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, timeSrc:"_start")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, offset: -3h, timeSrc:"_start")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 1000.0}))  //needed if unit in kwh
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  //|> range(start: -1d)  // Last day
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "real_power")
  |> drop(columns: ["host","serial","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> group(columns: ["real_power", "_measurement"], mode:"by")  
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, timeSrc:"_start")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, offset: -3h, timeSrc:"_start")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 1000.0}))  //needed if unit in kwh
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  //|> range(start: -1d)  // Last day
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "real_power")
  |> drop(columns: ["host","serial","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> group(columns: ["real_power", "_measurement"], mode:"by")  
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, timeSrc:"_start")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, offset: -3h, timeSrc:"_start")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 1000.0}))  //needed if unit in kwh
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  //|> range(start: -1d)  // Last day
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "real_power")
  |> drop(columns: ["host","serial","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> group(columns: ["real_power", "_measurement"], mode:"by")  
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, timeSrc:"_start")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, offset: -3h, timeSrc:"_start")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 1000.0}))  //needed if unit in kwh
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  //|> range(start: -1d)  // Last day
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "real_power")
  |> drop(columns: ["host","serial","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> group(columns: ["real_power", "_measurement"], mode:"by")  
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, timeSrc:"_start")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, offset: -3h, timeSrc:"_start")
  //|> aggregateWindow(every: 1mo, fn: sum, offset: -1d, timeSrc:"_start")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1mo, fn: sum, offset: -1d, createEmpty: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 1000.0}))  //needed if unit in kwh
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  //|> range(start: -1d)  // Last day
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "real_power")
  |> drop(columns: ["host","serial","model","driver_version","driver_version_data","status_OL","status_OB"])
  |> group(columns: ["real_power", "_measurement"], mode:"by")  
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, timeSrc:"_start")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, offset: -3h, timeSrc:"_start")
  //|> aggregateWindow(every: 1mo, fn: sum, offset: -1d, timeSrc:"_start")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1mo, fn: sum, offset: -1d, createEmpty: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 1000.0}))  //needed if unit in kwh
  |> yield(name: "mean")

title: NUT UPS Telegraf
